data.actual_result: beautifully abstracted and smashed names and roles :^3
data.short_description: Scrolling in the userlist on a busy server smashes names and roles
data.steps_to_repro: - Join an active server (we reproed this in discord linux and API) - Scroll halfway inside a role, so that some names are cut off - Wait for a user to come online, or someone to go offline
